column3: After dividends on preferred and preference stock of subsidiaries.

Segment net income (loss) for the traditional operating companies in 2014 and 2013 includes $868 million in pre-tax charges ($536 million after tax) and $1.2 billion in pre-tax charges ($729 million after tax), respectively, for estimated probable losses on the Kemper IGCC.
